The right side is the Medium, very vibrant, but it's printed like vinyl on the shirt and is insanely Uncomfortable.  I'm not too sure why each one is completely different, but they're still awesome

Only complaint is that the graphic on mine came a little worn out, it has visible horizontal print lines, but I’ve seen in other reviews their graphics were perfect! I don’t mind too much, just wish it was the more vibrant print! Love it!
great material, design doesn't fade, material doesn't shrink

评论概述: Tons of Compliments, Tricky Sizing Though...
评论详情: As a fan of vintage fashion, I recently tried out the "Y2K 90s Vintage Graphic Oversize Shirt," and I must say, it's a blast from the past in the best way possible!  The first thing that stood out to me was the vibrant and eye-catching graphics on the shirt. It truly captures the essence of the 90s and Y2K era with its bold and retro designs.  The oversized fit of the shirt adds to its casual and laid-back appeal. It's perfect for those who enjoy a relaxed and effortlessly cool style. The loose fit also allows for comfortable movement, making it ideal for everyday wear or even as a statement piece for special occasions. It's a bit small for me, while still being "oversized" (Boxy fit). I'm 6'4" with an athletic build. It fits perfectly now, but I'm very careful when washing it to ensure it doesn't shrink.  One of the things I appreciate about this shirt is its versatility. It can be styled in various ways to suit different aesthetics. The possibilities are endless, and it's a great addition to any fashion-forward wardrobe.  However, it's important to note that the sizing of the shirt can be a bit tricky. As it is an oversized style, it might be larger or smaller than expected. I'd recommend carefully checking the size chart and considering sizing up if you prefer a more "oversized" look. Additionally, the fabric quality may vary from design to design, so it's advisable to read customer reviews and choose designs that have received positive feedback.  All in all, this tee is a must-have for anyone looking to embrace the nostalgia and fashion trends of the 90s and early 2000s. Its vibrant graphics, comfortable fit, and versatile styling options make it a standout piece in any fashion enthusiast's collection.
This shirt was a little small but the design is really cute and I can work with it.

评论概述: Runs small, like chinese size small
评论详情: gave it to my gf and she loves it so still gonna give 5 stars
This fit great until I washed it, now it’s bulky around the neck and shrunk after one wash. Very thick materials too!

Had a feeling this would be small but I wanted to see anyways since I really loved the design. At its largest size, it would comfortably fit a medium although for an oversized affect, you’d have to be a size small.
This shirt is honestly so fun to wear. You can easily dress it down with ripped jeans and the shirt tied  or not. Material feels really cool against the skin.
Nice but it’s alittle too big for oversized it’s more like MENS small
Love the feel of the material and design. It's comfortable but shrinks in the dryer.
This is a nice feeling material.  The fit is as expected.  The color and design are true to what is depicted.  I really like the design.  It is quirky and fun and starts a lot of conversations!
Looks exactly as pictured. Pretty funny. Gets a good response from people. Large and heavy weight shirt. Good quality.

评论概述: Odd design, but fun. Not really oversized at all
评论详情: I thought the design was a little odd, but fun. Some friends have asked me what it is, I just tell them it's fun and comfortable. It is not however "oversized" - you'll need to order several sizes above normal for that.

评论概述: Cute design but not as comfortable fabric
评论详情: I was hoping this tshirt was going to be a softer cotton material, but it's a little stiff. I'm hoping after I wash it a few times it will make it more comfortable to wear with nothing under it. The size fits pretty well, if not a little tight at the bottom. The design on the shirt is really cute (I'm actually not sure what the shirt translates to) and I love the blue color.
I ordered a medium and it was as big as a large lol it’s still very cute and comfortable, but I’d size down if you don’t want it too oversized
I love the vintage black wash of the shirt, and the design adds a nice urban touch.
It’s very thick material and the design looks just as pictured.
i love this graphic tee! perfect material and super cute
This shirt fits well and it has a cool design on it. It looks as if it were an old shirt.
Well made shirt looks like picture. Nice thick material. Love this

I love this shirt. It is a beautiful blue color. I love the Asian culture and was excited to get this shirt. The description says over sized tee.  I read other reviews that said to size down because it is over sized. I sized down. I with I hadn't. The shirt fits but is a bit tighter than I like and there is no room for shrinkage. Buy this great shirt but get your normal size. It is a good quality tee with a good quality print on it.

This shirt is thick, has a high collar, sizing is just right, and the print is vibrant. The shade of blue this shirt was dyed is perfect. Not too dark, not too light. The placement of the print is nice as well. Recommend to anyone looking for a cool graphic tee. Price is right.
Super comfortable and fits perfectly fine (I'm 5'8 and 135 lbs). This definitely gives off a street wear vibe that can be worn for everyday errands.

This is an amazing tee, it's super cute and super comfy dense knit cotton, and it's not starchy (the goldilocks texture), and the graphics are gorgeous. Highly recommend if sized right.  I ordered this in a medium. I'm an XS in actual sizing, but I love oversized. I thought since the ad says "oversized" ordering a medium would be safe, but I should've ordered a large or higher. I have a short torso and the bottom hem falls right on the bottom of my bum (awkward place to fall, especially in the front it looks odd). It's also not very wide, especially in the chest area; I'm a 32DDD and this was fitted to my chest which made me look boxy. Definitely size up a few if you're looking for oversized!

评论概述: Great shirt! Translates to “I like it”
评论详情: My daughter wanted a loose fit. She’s 5’9” and about 140lbs. We ordered a Large. Love the blue and the graphics. The blue you see in the photos where she is wearing the shirt is accurate. Not sure why my camera was having a hard time capturing the blue when I had it laying on the table. The Japanese writing says “Sukidesu” which translates to “I like it”.
I ordered my normal size as it’s described as an oversized tee. Well, it’s not unless you size up. It’s just a regular standard size large tee.
